channel.title: [Help] Connecting to a Server via Client
channel.description:
When I try to connect to my friends server using a client I get this error. [IMG]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Camoboii/Error-1.jpg[/img]
I have JDK downloaded, I think I have 'Path' set correctly. [IMG]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Camoboii/Path-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Help] Connecting to a Server via Client
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Classpath? I didn’t know you needed that for Vista. Also the run edit on my client looks like this @echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

EDIT: I don’t mean to be spoon fed but, could you tell me the Path and Classpath codes I need to put in? I have JDK 6u16. Also, should they be under System variables or User variables? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2009, 07:03:38 pm[/size][hr]Double post:
Topic Closed, I think I have it working now. Thanks for the support + help ;).

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Connecting to a Server via Client

item.title: [Help] Connecting to a Server via Client
item.dc:creator: @nicktheman75 nicktheman75
item.description:
@nicktheman75 wrote:

ok go edit your run file and put your jdk type in it. that should work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2009, 06:44:24 pm[/size][hr]oh and do you have CLASSPATH set?

Read full topic
